state.text: Greetings and welcome to this demo of dynamically generated email template preview!

state.richText:
Lets look at some features that was implemented so far:
  • Dynamic content via select element (try to change logo URL)
  • Dynamic text (you are current reading it!)
  • Toggles and check boxes (try to toggle test button)
  • Dynamic styling for elements
  • Support for Rich text editor (Trix editor was used in this demo app)
  • Dynamic content for different locales via JSON schemas

And that's about it for now. Thanks!
